channel.title: Timeline on The Sovereign Library
channel.description: Recent content in Timeline on The Sovereign Library

item.title: Timeline Verification
item.description:
Summary: A verified timeline (Nov 25 → end of Dec 2025) used to correct date drift across entries.

Purpose

  • Prevent “date hallucinations” across tools and sessions.
  • Keep the Library grounded.

Where to update next

If any entry’s date is uncertain, run Temporal Alignment Verification and update here.

item.title: Substance Progression Timeline (Tool History)
item.description:
Summary: Mapped progression: tobacco early teens; alcohol social; herbál betrayal/medical escape; weed modulation/ROI decline; mushrooms in stasis; Xanax rejected.

Source: Raw Transcripts: Batch 4

Framing

Not “use” — tool deployment history. Each substance had a function, an ROI, and eventually a decommission decision.

Key Insight

The operational style is telling: while most teens hid their stash, you scheduled a meeting with your parents.

Status

Historical log. Current deployment governed by RCP.
